notes.text: sap.m.DatePicker - new "navigate" event added
sap.m.PlanningCalendar - Improved text truncation for the calendar appointment
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: One Month view for desktop.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: custom color for appointments and legend items
sap.ui.unified.CalendarLegend: The possibility of adding long text
General shadow fix
fix font-size of sap.ui.unified.Menu
sap.m.PlanningCalendar - switching year in week view for negative time zones is corrected.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Displayed correctly in RTL
sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Day selection drag threshold added
sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Day selection drag threshold reverted
sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Used short format for the week names when there is not enough space
sap.ui.unified.Calendar: multiple selection when multiple months is now consistent with the single selection
sap.ui.unified.CalendarLegend: Legend responsiveness is now similar across browsers
sap.ui.unified.CalendarUtils: Week number calculated correctly for all "en-US" locales
sap.ui.unified.Currency: Correct aligned in table
sap.ui.unified.MenuTextFieldItem: Process enter key on keyup like for other Menuitems instead of keydown
sap.ui.unified.Shell/sap.m.Toolbar: Fix focus contrast issues in IE/Edge
sap.ui.unified.Shell: Avoid URL announcement of Screenreader
sap.m.Planning Calendar: Selected state of appointment is read
sap.m.PlanningCalendar-tap on appointment on mobile should not fire rowSelectionChange.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: 1 month view for S and M sizes is usable now.
sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Invalidate Months only if they exist
sap.m.Month - Adding special dates to the month does not move the focus from other elements on the page
sap.ui.unified.Calendar.MonthPicker - onThemeChanged before control is rendered was throwing an error
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: corrected checks for detecting Japanese and Chinese
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: displayed correctly in Japanese and Chinese
: sap.ui.unified.calendar controls. - focused item is preserved after rerendering.
sap.m.Menu: Item separator position and height corrected
sap.ui.unified.calendar.CalendarDateInterval: setStartDate to min/max date no longer throws an error.
m.Menu: Header border and menu padding are fixed for phone
sap.ui.unified.Menu: opening as a context menu improved for RTL
sap.ui.unified.calendar.Header: Previous and next buttons have aria info
